official-title.#text:
To make supplemental appropriations for fiscal year 2014 for the tree and wood pests activities of
			 the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service and for certain forest
			 health management and urban and community forestry activities of the
			 Forest Service.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on the

, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such
			 provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service

section 251(b)(2)(D) of

quote.#text: Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service-salaries and expenses

italic.#tail: , That such amount is designated as being for disaster relief pursuant to

header.#text: Supplemental appropriations for APHIS tree and wood pests activities

text.#text:
The following sums are appropriated, out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated,
			 for fiscal year 2014:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 251(b)(2)(D) of
			 the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}fund.#tail:
, of which $15,000,000 shall be used for forest
			 health management for cooperative lands and $5,000,000 shall be used for
			 urban and community forestry:

italic.#tail: , That such amount is designated as being for disaster relief pursuant to

header.#text: Supplemental appropriations for certain State and private forestry activities of the Forest Service

text.#text:
The following sums are appropriated, out of any money in the Treasury not otherwise appropriated,
